ai-ja424:2.1_0: and the world is swept away by the world.
ai-ja424:3.2_0: earned by his efforts and initiative,
ai-ja424:3.3_0: has passed over Yama’s Vetaraṇi River;
ai-ja424:3.4_0: that mortal arrives at celestial fields.
ai-ja424:4.1_0: Giving and warfare are similar, they say,
ai-ja424:4.2_0: for even a few of the good may conquer the many.
ai-ja424:4.3_0: If a faithful person gives even a little,
ai-ja424:4.4_0: and so find happiness in the hereafter.
ai-ja424:5.1_0: The Holy One praises giving intelligently
ai-ja424:5.2_0: to those worthy of offerings here in the world of the living.
ai-ja424:5.3_0: What’s given to these is very fruitful,
ai-ja424:5.4_0: like seeds sown in a fertile field.
ai-ja424:6.1_0: One who lives without harming any living being
ai-ja424:6.2_0: never does bad because of others’ blame;
ai-ja424:6.3_0: for in that case they praise the coward, not the brave;
ai-ja424:6.4_0: and the virtuous never do bad out of fear.
ai-ja424:7.1_0: Though the spiritual life is inferior,
ai-ja424:8.1_0: It’s true that giving is praised in many ways
ai-ja424:8.2_0: but the path of the teaching is better than giving,
ai-ja424:8.3_0: for in days old and older still,
ai-ja424:8.4_0: the wise and virtuous even attained extinction.”
ai-ja424:9.1_0: The eighth sub-chapter on fire is finished.
